Public MustInherit Class ConstructorInfo Inherits MethodBase Implements _ConstructorInfo
public ref class ConstructorInfo abstract : System::Reflection::MethodBase, System::Runtime::InteropServices::_ConstructorInfo
type ConstructorInfo = class inherit MethodBase interface _ConstructorInfo

summary.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a class constructor and provides access to constructor metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ConstructorInfo` 用于发现构造函数的属性以及调用构造函数。`ConstructorInfo` is used to discover the attributes of a constructor as well as to invoke a constructor. 通过调用创建对象上`ConstructorInfo`通过以下任一方法返回或方法对象。Objects are created by calling on a `ConstructorInfo` returned by either the or method of a object. > [!NOTE] > 继承自多个成员，如，可用来检查泛型方法。 inherits from several members, such as , that can be used to examine generic methods. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版构造函数不能为泛型，因此这些成员返回`false`或`null`。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 constructors cannot be generic, so these members return `false` or `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`ConstructorInfo`与和若要查找与指定的搜索条件匹配的构造函数。The following example uses `ConstructorInfo` with and to find the constructors that match the specified search criteria. [!code-cpp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CPP/type_getconstructor3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/CS/type_getconstructor3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[type_getconstructor3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Type_GetConstructor3/VB/type_getconstructor3.vb#1)]

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
This type is thread safe.

span.para: 继承自，必须重写以下成员重载： 。
When you inherit from , you must override the following member overload: .

summary.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

span.span: Invokes the constructor reflected by the instance that has the specified parameters, providing default values for the parameters not commonly used.

returns.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

span.span: An instance of the class associated with the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数量、 类型和中的元素顺序`parameters`数组应的数量、 类型和此实例反射的构造函数参数的顺序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 在调用构造函数中之前,`Invoke`确保调用方具有访问权限，并验证参数是否有效。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and verifies that the parameters are valid. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和使用反射，只要完全受信任代码调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建不具有任何实例构造函数的值类型的实例，使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. 此方法是使用默认值的以下重载版本的便捷方法。This method is a convenience method for the following overloaded version, using default values. 不能重写此方法。This method cannot be overridden. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数量、 类型和中的元素顺序`parameters`数组应的数量、 类型和此实例反射的构造函数参数的顺序相同。The number, type, and order of elements in the `parameters` array should be identical to the number, type, and order of parameters for the constructor reflected by this instance. 在调用构造函数中之前,`Invoke`可确保调用方具有访问权限，以及参数是否正确数目、 顺序和类型。Before calling the constructor, `Invoke` ensures that the caller has access permission and that the parameters are of the correct number, order and type. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 即私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问和使用反射，只要完全受信任代码调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. > [!NOTE] > 若要创建不具有任何实例构造函数的值类型的实例，使用方法。To create an instance of a value type that has no instance constructors, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将替代。This property overrides . 因此，当检查一组对象-例如，返回的数组-属性返回仅当给定的成员是一个构造函数。Therefore, when you examine a set of objects — for example, the array returned by — the property returns only when a given member is a constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来标识作为构造函数的对象。The following example uses the property to identify a object as a constructor. [!code-cpp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MemberInfo.MemberType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::Invoke`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.

span.span: Late-bound access using the COM IDispatch interface is not supported.
